resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: 'Open Sans', 'Lucida Grande', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fafafa;">One of he minor stars in the constellation Libra, usually washed out by the glow of the full moon is visible during a lunar eclipse in May 2022.
resource.chars: One of he minor stars in the constellation Libra, usually washed out by the glow of the full moon is visible during a lunar eclipse in May 2022.
